Full Memory:
Believing Snape is planning to steal the Philosophers stone, Harry, Ron, and Hermione decide to try and stop him. Together the three of them make their way to the trap door thag leads to the stone, and the three headed dog guarding it, Fluffy. Thankfully, Hagrid let slip that Fluffy falls asleep if you play music in front of him. 

Harry plays a flute, lullying the beast to sleep almost instantly. Handing the flute off to Hermione, Harry jumps down the trap door, falling a great deal before landing on some sort of plant. Calling back up to them Harry says its safe for Ron and Hermione to jump down and join him. 

Unfortunately, the plant they land on is Devils Snare, and it wraps around Harry and Ron, proceeding to try and squeeze the life out of them. Fortunately, Hermione recognizes the plant, and knows it is weak to fire. Using her wand, Hermione conjures up some fire, causing the plant to release the two boys and withdraw to escape the flames.
Brief Summary: Believing Snape is trying to steal the pholosophers stone, Harry, Ron, and Hermione attempt to stop him. They put Fluffy to sleep by playing a flute, and after being restrained briefly by the Devils Snare plant, Hermione uses her knowledge of it's weaknesses to save Harry and Rone.
